themes: perceived lack of local author support
key_phrases: Texas Book Festival is a great event, it focuses on authors and publishers outside of Texas
events like the Lone Star Festival which focuses on Austin authors and authors from Texas ONLY should be given greater support
Austin should support what they do
barriers_identified: lack of support for local (Austin/Texas) authors and festivals
solutions_proposed: greater support for events like the Lone Star Festival that focus on Austin and Texas authors
